name: Zodiac Runner!
description:
Choose your zodiac sign and make choices according to it!

Are you an impulsive Aries, a bossy Scorpio or a playful Gemini? Collect the right items and pick the right gates to reach your destiny!

Finish the levels and get the compatibility report made just for you and the sign you want to know!

Are they your true love, soulmate or just a great friend?

Find out all the answers you’re looking for and learn more about your zodiac sign!
publishers: RUBY OYUN VE YAZILIM DANISMANLIK SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
